articles.title: China property: running out of options as fallout spreads to shadow banking - Financial Times
articles.description: Systemic risks are mounting among non-banking financial bodies that lend to struggling house developers
articles.content:
Chinas repeated attempts to tackle its worsening property crisis resemble firework displays full of light and sound, quickly extinguished.

articles.title: Binance's Bitcoin Reserves Drop as Retail Flow Moves to Coinbase: CryptoQuant - CoinDesk
articles.description: The move appears to be in anticipation of the approval of spot bitcoin ETFs.
articles.content:
Bitcoin (BTC) is flowing from Binance to Coinbase, according to on-chain data compiled by CryptoQuant.

articles.title: Turkey Central Bank Raises Interest Rate - Bloomberg
articles.description: Turkey’s central bank hiked interest rates by double the amount markets expected on Thursday, bolstering the lira.
articles.content:
Turkeys central bank hiked interest rates by double the amount markets expected on Thursday, bolstering the lira.
